function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in the number of dangerous spots visited within the same scenario","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases due to unpredictable variations in the number of dangerous spots visited","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions to raise awareness and improve risk perception among the population","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and data analytics to identify high-risk areas","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities and local government"},{"Description":"Variability in the number of dangerous points visited between different scenarios","Impact":"Higher likelihood of exposure to contagious diseases due to inconsistency in the number of dangerous points visited across different scenarios","Mitigation":"Develop and promote standardized safety guidelines for route planning and navigation","Technologies":"Mobile applications for real-time risk assessment and route planning","People":"General population","Owner":"Navigation app developers and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Evidence of safer routes from a COVID-19 point of view","Impact":"Misinterpretation of research findings and implementation of ineffective measures to mitigate disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure transparent and detailed communication of research methodology and limitations to stakeholders and decision-makers","Technologies":"Data visualization tools and interactive dashboards to communicate research findings","People":"Policy-makers, urban planners, and public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions and communication specialists"}]}
